snippet.title: Glass Walls - Scene 1 Playthrough
snippet.description:
https://krajaratnam.itch.io/glass-walls

Glass Walls is a 3D, 3rd-person puzzle game featuring a unique perspective switching mechanic, a surrealist visual style, and an intergenerational story about mothers and daughters. Playing as 3 generations of women, players swap between different perspectives to solve intricate puzzles and discover the stories behind each of them. 

Playtime 15-20 minutes

Glass Walls was made by
Krishan Rajaratnam: Programming, Level Design, Audio Design
Mengqi Gao: Visual Design
Charles H. Huang: Narrative Design

Will Rhodes: Visual Design, Programming, Level Design

Made by NYU Game Center M.F.A. Candidates for the Studio 2 course in Spring 2020 (during COVID-19!)
